elements.title: StorTera
elements.description: Our key development is the SLIQ single liquid flow battery, which uses StorTera engineered graphite-sulphur battery chemistry and only a single tank of innovative catholyte liquid.

elements.title: VoltStorage
elements.description: Vanadium Redox Flow Batteries for home and optimisation of solar. Recently (July 2020) [raised eur6M](https://sifted.eu/articles/voltstorage-tesla-powerwall-alternative/) in funding

elements.title: EVO Energy
elements.description: We turn blue chip companies and SMEs’ sites into ecosystems of sustainable energy through rooftop solar panels, battery storage, solar carports and EV charging stations. check their [PPA](ttps://www.evoenergy.co.uk/services/power-purchase-agreement/) (min 200 panels / 40kwp, recommend epc certificate)

elements.title: TESVolt
elements.description: TESVOLT's award-winning battery management system ensures that commercial and industrial storage systems pay for themselves within just a few years.

elements.title: BMZ
elements.description: The BMZ Group is a leader in the entire product life cycle of cross-industry lithium-ion battery systems.

elements.title: Potassium Ion batteries
elements.description: In recent years, K-ion batteries (KIBs) have attracted significant attention as potential alternatives to LIBs. This review comprehensively covers the studies on electrochemical materials for KIBs. Another paper shows [An Intrinsically Non‐flammable Electrolyte for High‐Performance Potassium Batteries](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1002/anie.201913174)

elements.title: Nemesys energy - University of Florence spin-off
elements.description: A patented technology for electrical energy management and storage devices ( Hydrogen-Oxygen battery) that combines traditional/standard electric batteries with hydrogen injection for the production of electricity

elements.title: li-ion versus flow
elements.description: Despite many energy storage technologies vying for market share – including much-hyped alternatives like flow batteries, which position themselves as the long-duration technology of choice – lithium-ion has maintained its leading position in the sector.

elements.title: Form Energy
elements.description: developing a new kind of battery that would eliminate the need for coal and gas entirely, and allow for a 100% renewable, carbon free grid.

elements.title: Graphene battery breakthrough
elements.description: The startup [Nanotech Energy](https://nanotechenergy.com/) claims to be “the world’s top supplier of graphene” and plans to release a non-flammable, environmentally friendly lithium battery that can charge “18 times faster than anything that is currently available on the market” — within the next year.

elements.title: Anesco
elements.description: Designed and built 103 solar farms in the UK totalling 600MW. Market leader in the UK battery storage market. Managing and monitoring 1GW of clean energy across 22,500 renewable assets.

elements.title: Hycube
elements.description: Hycube  based in Germany, residential and commercial

elements.title: RedT
elements.description: RedT  vanadium flow batteries for industrial & commercial use

elements.title: Northvolt
elements.description: Northvolt, Stockholm based. [Raised 600M in Sep 2020](https://www.electrive.com/2020/09/29/northvolt-raises-600-million-from-investors/) to expand its production and recycling capacity and research and development activities.

elements.title: Electrovaya
elements.description: Electrovaya  was founded in 1996 as a research and development company focused on Lithium ion technologies and manufacturing processes. In 2000, the company was listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX:EFL) and over the years has delivered projects for specialized applications in the aerospace, automotive and personal electronics segments.

elements.title: PowerTech Systems
elements.description: PowerTech Systems  is a French company focussed on Lithium-Ion storage market and associated technologies. Specialized in design and engineering high performance Lithium batteries (> 1KW) covering a large application spectrum

elements.title: Nant energy
elements.description: Nant energy  **Zinc batteries** aiming 100$/kwh has been recently featured in [NY times](https://www.nytimes.com/2018/09/26/business/energy-environment/zinc-battery-solar-power.html)

elements.title: Power Blox
elements.description: Power Blox  based in Zurich, working on projects for Africa / developing countries, CTO and Co-Founder is [Alessandro Medici](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alessandro-medici-90a91030/)

elements.title: Tesla powerwall
elements.description: Tesla powerwall

elements.title: Sonnen
elements.description: Sonnen  German company, been recently (Feb 19) bought by Shell [in the news](https://edition.cnn.com/2019/02/15/tech/shell-sonnen-home-batteries/index.html)

elements.title: Moixa
elements.description: Moixa  UK’s leading smart battery company, that offers integrated hardware and GridShare™ software, for renewable energy management.

elements.title: Volts battery
elements.description: Volts battery , Finland based for residential

elements.title: PowerFlow
elements.description: PowerFlow

elements.title: FIAMM
elements.description: FIAMM  Italian battery company, part of the Hitachi group, historically for vehicles, now shifting towards other markets

elements.title: Box of Energy
elements.description: The company was founded in Gothenburg, Sweden, in 2014 with the concept of using 2nd life electric car batteries to create a product that covers all needs for energy storage.

elements.title: Relectrify
elements.description: Radically rethinking battery management system and inverter technology for long-life, low-cost battery storage

elements.title: PowerVault
elements.description: PowerVault  London based, batteries for residential, recycling EV batteries

elements.title: Reluce
elements.description: Reluce [li-ion capacitors](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithium-ion_capacitor) 120kW to 2.5MW

elements.title: Connected Energy
elements.description: Connected Energy , based in Newcastle, UK. Recycling EV batteries but for commercial and industrial

elements.title: Blue planet energy
elements.description: Blue planet energy  Hawaii based storage for residential

elements.title: Pivot Power
elements.description: Pivot Power  London + Oxford based big battery storage projects for EV charging and large residential / commercial developments connected directly to the transmission system.

elements.title: eCamion
elements.description: eCamion  was founded on the principle of providing green energy to support the future needs of a growing population and offering new solutions for Utilities, Automotive, Mining, Renewables and Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure.

elements.title: fluoride-ion battery
elements.description: new fluoride-ion battery tech from honda / jpl / caltech
